title: Pre-existing TypeScript syntax error in widget test file
issue: TypeScript compilation errors at line 1067: 'Declaration or statement expected.' preventing widget typecheck. File appears syntactically correct when inspected, suggesting possible file corruption or encoding issue. These errors pre-date the TKT-007-V2-V2 documentation work.
suggestion: Review the file for hidden characters or encoding issues. The visible content at line 1067 appears correct (closing brace and semicolon), so this may be a tool/cache issue. Try: 1) Clean build cache, 2) Re-save file with UTF-8 encoding, 3) Check for hidden characters.
